subject: Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals registering RX+ or RX- Signal with no presses
description_text:
Hello,

Today I noticed when trying to re-calibrate my Simsonn Pro X Ultra  pedals that when I try to assign a button ingame it registeres RX+ or RX- as input without me pressing anything at all.

When I check in the Simsonn software everything seems right, no loadcell fluctuation no nothing at all, I tried grounding the rig and using separate power but nothing seems to help, any other things that I can try?


Thank you,

Cosmin.

conversations.body_text: Hi Anichitei Cosmin,    Sorry for the delay, we are waiting for the German warehouse to arrive before we ship it to you to avoid customs duties. Your package has been shipped and is expected to arrive around the 13th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=CE326618434DE

Hi Anichitei Cosmin,     This is a configuration issue. Please use version 2.1.1, then click “Restore” on the interface and afterwards click “Save.” This will disable the Rx axis. After that, please test again to see if the problem is resolved.   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UPkeOHREyALtCtNmL87a2WnUDZV0Gx_b/view?usp=drive_link

Sincerely thank you, this fixed everything. I really really appreciate the
answer and the constant replies.

Thank you again,

Cosmin.
